name: Anaplan
painPoints: Disconnected planning silos across departments
Inability to model complex business scenarios at scale
Slow budgeting cycles with too many spreadsheets

erpIntegrations.notes: Pre-built connector via Anaplan CloudWorks
CloudWorks connector for GL and transactional data
CloudWorks connector for Dynamics 365
CloudWorks connector for Workday Financials and HCM
REST API integration; not a typical Anaplan use case
Custom API integration required
Custom API integration required

keyFeatures: Connected planning across finance, sales, and supply chain
PlanIQ predictive forecasting with machine learning
Scenario planning with unlimited what-if versions
description: Anaplan is the enterprise-grade connected planning platform that unifies planning across finance, sales, and operations. Its proprietary Hyperblock engine enables complex multi-dimensional models at massive scale, making it the go-to choice for Fortune 500 companies tackling cross-functional planning.

deploymentComplexity.dataMigration: Significant — requires mapping all planning models, hierarchies, and historical data
deploymentComplexity.changeManagement: High — model builders need extensive training; end-user adoption requires structured rollout

name: Workday Adaptive Planning

Inability to do rolling forecasts efficiently

description: Workday Adaptive Planning delivers cloud-native FP&A with powerful modeling, rolling forecasts, and deep integration into the Workday ecosystem. Its intuitive interface and Elastic Hypercube Technology make it a top choice for mid-market and enterprise organizations seeking agility in planning.

deploymentComplexity.dataMigration: Moderate — simplified if already on Workday HCM/Financials; otherwise requires GL and workforce data mapping
deploymentComplexity.changeManagement: Moderate — intuitive interface reduces training needs but process redesign is still required

name: Planful

deploymentComplexity.dataMigration: Moderate — GL mapping and historical actuals required; consolidation rules can add complexity
deploymentComplexity.changeManagement: Moderate — structured interface requires process alignment and user training
